<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!ResultIsSigned) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Both are unsigned.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ResultHasUnsignedPadding = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointsemantics/#a516540ad4950d71de2266507041b9c6e">hasUnsignedPadding</a>() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">                               <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa6311ae17c1ee52b36e68aaf4ad066387">Other</a>.hasUnsignedPadding() &amp;&amp; !ResultIsSaturated;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the result is signed, add an extra bit for the sign. Otherwise, if it is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// unsigned and has unsigned padding, we only need to add the extra padding</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bit back if we are not saturating.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ResultIsSigned || ResultHasUnsignedPadding)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CommonWidth++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointsemantics/#ae59a8566a4fccd51331fdfcbe2cba59a">FixedPointSemantics</a>(CommonWidth, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/fixedpointsemantics/lsb">Lsb</a>&#123;CommonLsb&#125;, ResultIsSigned,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             ResultIsSaturated, ResultHasUnsignedPadding);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Wide = CommonFXSema.getWidth() &#42; 2;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ThisVal = ThisVal.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a1dc76cc8bf703e6ada68bededcbb9573">zext</a>(Wide);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Perform the full multiplication and downscale to get the same scale.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note that the right shifts here perform an implicit downwards rounding.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This rounding could discard bits that would technically place the result</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// outside the representable range. We interpret the spec as allowing us to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// perform the rounding step first, avoiding the overflow case that would</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// arise.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apsint">APSInt</a> Result;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CommonFXSema.isSigned())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Result = ThisVal.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#ac155d7c568fc1aba25723e77b6888908">smul&#95;ov</a>(OtherVal, Overflowed)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlight">                 .<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a793e27a4e7b6ec5ecab8e7616e0d4ac0">relativeAShl</a>(CommonFXSema.getLsbWeight());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Result = ThisVal.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a028f4d1eead63cc33499ce3459bd27c7">umul&#95;ov</a>(OtherVal, Overflowed)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><span class="doxyHighlight">                 .<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a3bbf73dc4411a52b8d03e582a09893ce">relativeLShl</a>(CommonFXSema.getLsbWeight());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!Overflowed &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Full multiplication cannot overflow!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Result.setIsSigned(CommonFXSema.isSigned());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If our result lies outside of the representative range of the common</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// semantic, we either have overflow or saturation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apsint">APSInt</a> Max = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfixedpoint/#ae7ca9ff56521cc2e2c51d96ad9a6005c">APFixedPoint::getMax</a>(CommonFXSema).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfixedpoint/#a82cc2364c94c614756f6013fd3fb902a">getValue</a>()</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfixedpoint/#a6f50fded9ec4a127a18b88ef2a61163e"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfloat">APFloat</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfixedpoint/#a6f50fded9ec4a127a18b88ef2a61163e">APFixedPoint::convertToFloat</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/fltsemantics">fltSemantics</a> &amp;FloatSema)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For some operations, rounding mode has an effect on the result, while</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// other operations are lossless and should never result in rounding.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To signify which these operations are, we define two rounding modes here.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/apfloatbase/#a1ea536c95c40fca11948b01252554b2a">APFloat::roundingMode</a> RM = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/apfloatbase/#a22ed74f1ed33c4d33f524a650ea536a6">APFloat::rmNearestTiesToEven</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/apfloatbase/#a1ea536c95c40fca11948b01252554b2a">APFloat::roundingMode</a> LosslessRM = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/apfloatbase/#a482d9cf95b588eb05cefeaa5c05be9a3">APFloat::rmTowardZero</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="510"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Make sure that we are operating in a type that works with this fixed-point</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="511"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// semantic.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="512"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/fltsemantics">fltSemantics</a> &#42;OpSema = &amp;FloatSema;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="513"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Sema.fitsInFloatSemantics(&#42;OpSema))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="514"><span class="doxyHighlight">    OpSema = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfixedpoint/#aca508af3c3b25de78d97741420a9ff9e">promoteFloatSemantics</a>(OpSema);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Convert the fixed point value bits as an integer. If the floating point</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// value does not have the required precision, we will round according to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// given mode.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfloat">APFloat</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targetlibraryinfo-cpp/#aca185e6d0e9f423dbb24440206454872a11534cddb9d36ce7b049eefacc295a96">Flt</a>(&#42;OpSema);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/apfloatbase/#aee544c332088dbef348a0c1c97e21a6a">APFloat::opStatus</a> S = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targetlibraryinfo-cpp/#aca185e6d0e9f423dbb24440206454872a11534cddb9d36ce7b049eefacc295a96">Flt</a>.convertFromAPInt(Val, Sema.isSigned(), RM);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we cared about checking for precision loss, we could look at this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// status.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><span class="doxyHighlight">  (void)S;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Scale down the integer value in the float to match the correct scaling</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// factor.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfloat">APFloat</a> ScaleFactor(std::pow(2, Sema.getLsbWeight()));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Ignored;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ScaleFactor.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfloat/#a257e3cb529defa79ad7a9f42072f339a">convert</a>(&#42;OpSema, LosslessRM, &amp;Ignored);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targetlibraryinfo-cpp/#aca185e6d0e9f423dbb24440206454872a11534cddb9d36ce7b049eefacc295a96">Flt</a>.multiply(ScaleFactor, LosslessRM);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (OpSema != &amp;FloatSema)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targetlibraryinfo-cpp/#aca185e6d0e9f423dbb24440206454872a11534cddb9d36ce7b049eefacc295a96">Flt</a>.convert(FloatSema, RM, &amp;Ignored);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targetlibraryinfo-cpp/#aca185e6d0e9f423dbb24440206454872a11534cddb9d36ce7b049eefacc295a96">Flt</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfixedpoint/#a738a0be04b7721972a680302c07c12bb"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfixedpoint/#a17de6476b95be00e26e2a67b4bdd105f">APFixedPoint</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfixedpoint/#a738a0be04b7721972a680302c07c12bb">APFixedPoint::getFromIntValue</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apsint">APSInt</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                           </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Overflow) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointsemantics">FixedPointSemantics</a> IntFXSema = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointsemantics/#aebc9b19a86db06690ffcc4904907e8be">FixedPointSemantics::GetIntegerSemantics</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="543"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>.getBitWidth(), <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>.isSigned());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="544"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfixedpoint/#a17de6476b95be00e26e2a67b4bdd105f">APFixedPoint</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>, IntFXSema).convert(DstFXSema, Overflow);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="545"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="546"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="547"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfixedpoint">APFixedPoint</a></span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="548" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfixedpoint/#a67272093577b2c99e6138e38c647abe3"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfixedpoint/#a67272093577b2c99e6138e38c647abe3">APFixedPoint::getFromFloatValue</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfloat">APFloat</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="549"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointsemantics">FixedPointSemantics</a> &amp;DstFXSema,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="550"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Overflow) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="551"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For some operations, rounding mode has an effect on the result, while</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="552"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// other operations are lossless and should never result in rounding.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="553"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To signify which these operations are, we define two rounding modes here,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="554"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// even though they are the same mode.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="555"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/apfloatbase/#a1ea536c95c40fca11948b01252554b2a">APFloat::roundingMode</a> RM = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/apfloatbase/#a482d9cf95b588eb05cefeaa5c05be9a3">APFloat::rmTowardZero</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="556"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/apfloatbase/#a1ea536c95c40fca11948b01252554b2a">APFloat::roundingMode</a> LosslessRM = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/apfloatbase/#a482d9cf95b588eb05cefeaa5c05be9a3">APFloat::rmTowardZero</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/fltsemantics">fltSemantics</a> &amp;FloatSema = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>.getSemantics();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>.isNaN()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Handle NaN immediately.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="562"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Overflow)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="563"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#42;Overflow = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="564"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfixedpoint/#a17de6476b95be00e26e2a67b4bdd105f">APFixedPoint</a>(DstFXSema);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="565"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="566"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="567"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Make sure that we are operating in a type that works with this fixed-point</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="568"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// semantic.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="569"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/fltsemantics">fltSemantics</a> &#42;OpSema = &amp;FloatSema;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="570"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!DstFXSema.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointsemantics/#ab30aaf95486d0b2aac87f3d9e1e450e3">fitsInFloatSemantics</a>(&#42;OpSema))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="571"><span class="doxyHighlight">    OpSema = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfixedpoint/#aca508af3c3b25de78d97741420a9ff9e">promoteFloatSemantics</a>(OpSema);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="572"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="573"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfloat">APFloat</a> Val = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="574"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="575"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Ignored;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="576"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (&amp;FloatSema != OpSema)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Val.convert(&#42;OpSema, LosslessRM, &amp;Ignored);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="579"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Scale up the float so that the &#39;fractional&#39; part of the mantissa ends up in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="580"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the integer range instead. Rounding mode is irrelevant here.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="581"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// It is fine if this overflows to infinity even for saturating types,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="582"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// since we will use floating point comparisons to check for saturation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfloat">APFloat</a> ScaleFactor(std::pow(2, -DstFXSema.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointsemantics/#aaea346c0aab9c7f4608ce41a4c217fa5">getLsbWeight</a>()));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ScaleFactor.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfloat/#a257e3cb529defa79ad7a9f42072f339a">convert</a>(&#42;OpSema, LosslessRM, &amp;Ignored);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Val.multiply(ScaleFactor, LosslessRM);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Convert to the integral representation of the value. This rounding mode</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="588"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is significant.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="589"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apsint">APSInt</a> Res(DstFXSema.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointsemantics/#a2f3dab29dd773a1faa002a701261db99">getWidth</a>(), !DstFXSema.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointsemantics/#a05ad0838e692b5cdc021f49da8343187">isSigned</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="590"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Val.convertToInteger(Res, RM, &amp;Ignored);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="591"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="592"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Round the integral value and scale back. This makes the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="593"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// overflow calculations below work properly. If we do not round here,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we risk checking for overflow with a value that is outside the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// representable range of the fixed-point semantic even though no overflow</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// would occur had we rounded first.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="597"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ScaleFactor = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfloat">APFloat</a>(std::pow(2, DstFXSema.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointsemantics/#aaea346c0aab9c7f4608ce41a4c217fa5">getLsbWeight</a>()));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="598"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ScaleFactor.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfloat/#a257e3cb529defa79ad7a9f42072f339a">convert</a>(&#42;OpSema, LosslessRM, &amp;Ignored);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="599"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Val.roundToIntegral(RM);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="600"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Val.multiply(ScaleFactor, LosslessRM);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check for overflow/saturation by checking if the floating point value</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="603"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is outside the range representable by the fixed-point value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfloat">APFloat</a> FloatMax = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfixedpoint/#ae7ca9ff56521cc2e2c51d96ad9a6005c">getMax</a>(DstFXSema).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfixedpoint/#a6f50fded9ec4a127a18b88ef2a61163e">convertToFloat</a>(&#42;OpSema);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfloat">APFloat</a> FloatMin = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfixedpoint/#a1c4398afd568f2c31f81dcecad35ef7b">getMin</a>(DstFXSema).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfixedpoint/#a6f50fded9ec4a127a18b88ef2a61163e">convertToFloat</a>(&#42;OpSema);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Overflowed = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="607"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DstFXSema.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointsemantics/#a56da39babaf07b5638145d232de64949">isSaturated</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="608"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Val &gt; FloatMax)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="609"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Res = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfixedpoint/#ae7ca9ff56521cc2e2c51d96ad9a6005c">getMax</a>(DstFXSema).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfixedpoint/#a82cc2364c94c614756f6013fd3fb902a">getValue</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="610"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Val &lt; FloatMin)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="611"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Res = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfixedpoint/#a1c4398afd568f2c31f81dcecad35ef7b">getMin</a>(DstFXSema).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfixedpoint/#a82cc2364c94c614756f6013fd3fb902a">getValue</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="612"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="613"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Overflowed = Val &gt; FloatMax || Val &lt; FloatMin;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="614"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="615"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Overflow)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="616"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#42;Overflow = Overflowed;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="617"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="618"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfixedpoint/#a17de6476b95be00e26e2a67b4bdd105f">APFixedPoint</a>(Res, DstFXSema);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="619"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="620"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="621"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// namespace llvm</span></CodeLine>
